title: Hii I am Bhanu from India and I want to buy Google pixel 4a(5g) so will it work in India??
content:
Hello Google
I am Bhanu Sharma from India and I have been waiting for Google pixel since 3/4 years but it's very disappointing that it has not launched.
12 November Dhanteras is very lucky day and I want to purchase the device on the day so it's my humble request to you to provide me pixel 4a(5g) in India
Plzz look forward to this...
